definition: grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
beta particle (electron, esp. high speed electron emitted by radioactive nucleus)

sentences.english: Quantum theory is a branch of physics that deals with very small particles.
sentences.chinese: 量子论是一门研究微粒子的物理学。

sentences.english: The existence of large second phases is found to be beneficial to nucleation.
sentences.chinese: 粗大的第二相粒子对再结晶形核具有促进作用。

sentences.english: The particle size distributions of submicrometer particles during pulverized coal combustion were typically bimodal.
sentences.chinese: 煤粉燃烧细粒子的粒径分布呈典型的双峰分布。

sentences.english: The existence of the particle movement, increase block medium dispersion medium viscosity.
sentences.chinese: 粒子的存在阻碍介质的运动，增加分散介质的黏度。

sentences.english: The invention discloses an ultra-thin silica-based particle detector and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种超薄硅基粒子探测器及其制备方法。

sentences.english: XRD indicates that CB and barium titanate were existed in the compound particle.
sentences.chinese: XRD分析可知复合粒子中含有钛酸钡晶体和炭黑。

sentences.english: Leptons , the best known of which is the electron, are immune to the strong force.
sentences.chinese: 轻子中最著名的是电子，这类粒子不会感受到强力。

sentences.english: Barium carbonate was prepared by using common precipitation method.
sentences.chinese: 采用共沉淀法合成了碳酸钡粒子。

sentences.english: The particle exhaust of Fusion Experimental Breeder FEB E is carried out with divertor.
sentences.chinese: 的粒子抽除是通过偏滤器进行的。

sentences.english: That, in turn, is suspended in a transparent oily fluid.
sentences.chinese: 反过来，就是这些白色粒子悬浮在透明油层中。

sentences.english: Come 2010 she finally got the bullet removed.
sentences.chinese: 直到2010年她才把那粒子弹取走。

sentences.english: Among the particles predicted to appear during this cooling are strange quarks.
sentences.chinese: 预计在冷却过程中出现的粒子将是奇异夸克。

sentences.english: These generated particles then create patterns of light that the detectors can distinguish.
sentences.chinese: 这些产生的粒子当时产生探测器能够识别的光图样。

sentences.english: Particles are as spread out as baseball outfielders.
sentences.chinese: 这些粒子就像棒球外野手那样，散得很开。

sentences.english: The collisionless magnetic reconnection is studied using two dimensional full particle simulation.
sentences.chinese: 采用二维全粒子模拟方法研究了无碰撞磁场重联。

sentences.english: By localization analysis, this protein is attached to the BV particle.
sentences.chinese: 对其定位研究发现，该蛋白连在BV病毒粒子上。

definition: neutrino (particle physics)/also written 微中子[wei1 zhong1 zi3]
